settingsDescription: Sarrafa asusun ajinka da zaɓuɓɓukan shafin.
resetYourPassword: Sake saita kalmar sirrinka na asusunka na chancellorminus.com.
sendPasswordResetEmail: Aika Imel na Sake Saita Kalmar Sirri
languageDescription: Abubuwan da ke cikin shafin da hulɗar AI za su yi amfani da harshen da ka fi so.
noEmailAddress: Ba a sami adireshin imel na wannan asusun ba.
passwordResetEmailSent: An Aika Imel na Sake Saita Kalmar Sirri
checkYourInbox: Da fatan za a duba akwatin saƙonka don umarnin sake saita kalmar sirrinka.
errorSendingResetEmail: Kuskure wajen Aika Imel na Sake Saitawa
iChancellorWelcome: Sannu, ni ne iChancellor. Ina nan don tallafa maka a tafiyarka zuwa ga lafiya. Ta yaya zan iya taimaka maka a yau? Za mu iya tattauna batun wayar da kai, halaye masu lafiya, ko fara tunani mai shiryarwa.
pageTitle: Chancellor Minus | Dan Kasuwa, Injiniyan AI & Cikakken Mai Haɓakawa
pageDescription: Cikakken kundin aiki mai amfani da AI wanda ke nuna ayyukan da gwanintar Chancellor Minus.
landingTitle: Makomar Ci gaban AI na Wakili da Samarwa — Yau
landingSubtitle: Chancellor Minus | Dan Kasuwa, Injiniyan AI & Cikakken Mai Haɓakawa
landingSearchPlaceholder: Bincika ayyuka... misali 'Binciko ayyukan AI da kirkire-kirkire na Chancellor'
noProjectsFound: Ba a sami ayyuka na '{searchQuery}' ba. Gwada wani bincike.
ctaDescription: Yi rijista don asusu don samun damar 'Rayuwa Mai Lafiya' — hanyarka zuwa ga zaman tunani mai shiryarwa, tallafin lafiya na keɓaɓɓu tare da iChancellor – mataimakin lafiyarka na AI, da kuma samun dama ta musamman ga Mai Samar da Fahimtar Fasaha don sabbin ra'ayoyi kan fasaha da walwala.
adminDescription: Sarrafa masu amfani, duba aiki, da kuma sa ido kan aikace-aikacen.
reportingDescription: Samar da rahotanni kan sa hannun mai amfani da lafiyar tsarin. (Mai zuwa nan ba da dadewa ba)
reportingPending: Aiwatar da rahoto yana nan a jira.
affirmationsDescription: Samar da tabbatarwa mai kyau don ƙarfafa ka da kuma ba ka kwarin gwiwa a tafiyarka ta ci gaban kanka.
affirmationsInitialText: Danna maballin don samar da tabbatarwa da fara tafiyarka.
affirmationError: An sami kuskure yayin samar da tabbatarwa. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
aiAssistantTitle: Daga Tunanin AI zuwa Gaskiyar Samarwa
aiAssistantDescription: Ina tsarawa, ginawa, da kuma faɗaɗa mafita masu basira na AI da ke magance ƙalubalen kasuwanci masu rikitarwa.
dashboardWelcome: Barka da zuwa, {name}! Zaɓi wani maudu'i don samun sabbin fahimta masu amfani da AI.
techInsightDescription: Zaɓi wani maudu'i kuma bari mai nazarin AI ya ba ka taƙaitawa da shawarwari.
insightPlaceholder: Fahimtarka da AI ta samar za ta bayyana a nan.
loginDescription: Shigar da takardun shaidarka don samun damar dashboard ɗinka.
venturesDescription: Wani nuni na kamfanoni da kayayyaki masu amfani da AI da na gina.
createAccountAndVerify: An ƙirƙiri asusunka! Da fatan za a duba imel ɗinka don tabbatar da asusunka.
welcomeNewUser: Barka da zuwa {name} ga dandalin Chancellor Minus!
haveAccount: Ka riga ka na da asusu?
aiAssistantWelcome: Sannu! Ni mataimakin AI na Chancellor ne. Tambaye ni komai game da gwanintarsa da gogewarsa.
activeUsersDescription: Duba masu amfani da ke aiki a halin yanzu a shafin.
loadingActiveUsers: Ana loda masu amfani da ke aiki...
noActiveUsers: Babu masu amfani da ke aiki a halin yanzu.
auditLogsDescription: Bibiyar muhimman abubuwan da suka faru da ayyuka a cikin aikace-aikacen.
noAuditLogs: Ba a sami log na bincike ba.
caseStudyDescription: Wannan nazarin harka na fasaha an samar da shi ne ta hanyar mataimakin AI.
generatingDeepDive: Ana samar da nazari mai zurfi...
contactDescription: Kana da tambaya ko kana son mu yi aiki tare? Rubuta mani.
footerText: © {year} Chancellor Minus. Dukkan hakkoki an adana su.
healthyLivingDescription: Abokin tarayyarka a cikin wayar da kai, lafiya, da ci gaban kai.
micDenied: An ƙi samun dama ga makirufo
audioFailed: Ba a iya samar da sauti ba.
skillsDescription: Wani kallo kan fasahohin da nake aiki da su don kawo ra'ayoyi zuwa rayuwa, daga gaban gaba zuwa turawa.
transcriberDescription: Yi rikodin ko loda sauti don rubuta shi ta amfani da Whisper na OpenAI.
audioReady: Sauti a shirye don rubutawa ({size} KB).
noAudioDescription: Da fatan za a yi rikodin ko loda fayil na sauti da farko.
affirmationPrompt: Bari mu samar da tabbatarwa ta yau don mayar da hankalinka da kuma karfafa mafi kyawun kanka.
